basics.label: M.Sc. Student in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
basics.summary: M.Sc. Student at Bilkent University, working on ensemble time-series forecasting in 5G networks. Experienced in deep learning, signal processing, and domain adaptation.

courses: Capstone Project: A smart monitor to keep track of vitals and sleep patterns of the baby

work.name: Bilkent University
work.summary: EEE321 Signals and Systems. Guiding and evaluating students during laboratory sessions, grading reports and quizzes. Organizing recitations.

work.name: Middle East Technical University
work.summary: Studied sample complexity of domain adaptation of different deep learning architectures. Performed regular neural network trainings with PyTorch to test novel theoretical bounds.

work.name: Middle East Technical University
work.summary: EE201 Circuit Theory I & EE224 Electromagnetic Theory. Organized weekly recitations and assisted the preparation of lecture notes.

work.name: UCLA (The Ozcan Research Group)
work.summary: Studied diffusion models for biomedical images. Helped the preparation of 3D printed diffractive layers for an all-optical image denoiser network.

work.name: TUBITAK SAGE
work.summary: Studied on bad pixel detection, wrote a MATLAB code that easifies the examination of calibration images. Improved robustness analysis algorithms.

work.name: Middle East Technical University
work.summary: Studied age-aware random access. Employed a LoRaWAN network at METU campus.

publications.name: Hierarchical ensemble-based feature selection for time series prediction
